definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: Finally, steps for recovering the files on fixed and flexible disks are illustrated with some examples.
sentences.chinese: 用例子說明了軟磁盤和硬磁盤上恢復文件的具體步驟。

sentences.english: First, insert the floppy disk, then push the button.
sentences.chinese: 首先放進軟磁盤，然後按下按鈕。

sentences.english: The computer comes bundled with software and diskettes.
sentences.chinese: 電腦與軟件和軟磁盤被一起提供來的。
